Class Code

java.lang.Object
mastermind.core.Code
public class Code extends Object
Represents a Mastermind code consisting of a sequence of colors.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Code

      public Code(List<Integer> code)
      Constructs a Code instance from a list of integers representing color indices.
      Parameters:
      code - the list of integers representing the color indices

    • Code

      public Code(String codeString)
      Constructs a Code instance from a string representation of the code. The string should have space-separated color names (e.g., "RED BLUE GREEN").
      Parameters:
      codeString - the string representation of the code

  • Method Details

    • getColor

      public Code.Color getColor(int index)
      Retrieves the color at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the color to retrieve
      Returns:
      the color at the specified index

    • getColorFromCode

      public static List<Code.Color> getColorFromCode(List<Integer> codeList)
      Converts a list of integer indices to a list of corresponding colors.
      Parameters:
      codeList - the list of integer indices
      Returns:
      a list of corresponding Color enum values

    • getCodeInDigits

      public List<Integer> getCodeInDigits()
      Converts the code to a list of integers representing the color indices.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the color indices

    • getColors

      public ArrayList<Code.Color> getColors()
      Retrieves the list of colors representing the code.
      Returns:
      a list of Color enum values representing the code

    • getOccurrences

      public HashMap<Code.Color,Integer> getOccurrences()
      Calculates the occurrences of each color in the code.
      Returns:
      a map with each color and its respective occurrence count in the code

    • isValidColorIndex

      public static boolean isValidColorIndex(int index)
      Validates whether a given index corresponds to a valid color in the Code enum.
      Parameters:
      index - the index to validate
      Returns:
      true if the index is valid, false otherwise

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Code other)
      Compares this code to another code to check if they are equal.
      Parameters:
      other - the other code to compare
      Returns:
      true if the codes are equal, false otherwise

    • generateRandomCode

      public static Code generateRandomCode()
      Generates a random code based on the game's difficulty level. The difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard) determine the number of unique colors and the number of colors in the code.
      Returns:
      a randomly generated Code

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the code to a string representation, where the colors are separated by spaces.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representation of the code
